lead_paragraph: Every Olympics has its breakthrough moments and for Adam Peaty, the big gold medal hope of British swimming, one of them will be getting his mum on a plane for the first time in her life.

headline.print_headline: Rio Will Be a Flying First for Peaty's Mum
headline.main: Rio Will Be a Flying First for Peaty's Mum

snippet: Every Olympics has its breakthrough moments and for Adam Peaty, the big gold medal hope of British swimming, one of them will be getting his mum on a plane for the first time in her life....
